subject: p18067737
History: Long smoking history with recurrent small cell carcinoma.
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there is little interval change. Again, there is a left hilar mass with volume loss and opacification in the left upper lobe, consistent with a post-obstructive pneumonia or collapse. The right lung is essentially clear.
